item.title: 美国银行上调预测，欧元将迎来 2009 年以来最好的一周
item.description: 在德国历史性地承诺增加国防和基础设施开支后，欧元将创下 16 年来最好的单周表现。【原文：The euro is set for its best weekly performance in 16 years after Germany’s historic pledge to ramp up spending for defense and infrastructure.】

item.title: DNO 同意收购 Sval 公司，将产量重心从伊拉克转向挪威
item.description: 挪威国家石油公司（DNO ASA）同意以4.5亿美元的价格从私募股权公司HitecVision手中收购Sval Energi Group AS的全部股份，以扩大其在挪威的业务。【原文：DNO ASA agreed to buy all the shares of Sval Energi Group AS for $450 million from private equity firm HitecVision, as the oil and gas company expands its operations in Norway.】

item.title: 里夫斯告诉金沙国际娱乐网址经济学家她将限制政府开支
item.description: 在全球债券和政府借贷成本剧烈波动的背景下，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）周四会见了金边债券市场的一级交易商公司，拉开了一年两次的新系列会议的序幕。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves met primary dealer firms in the gilt market on Thursday, kicking off a new series of twice-yearly meetings amid intense volatility in global bonds and government borrowing costs.】

item.title: 关税紧张局势下日本将派贸易大臣武藤访美
item.description: 日本贸易大臣武藤洋治将于下周访问美国，因为东京正加紧努力，寻求从唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税运动中获得缓和。【原文：Japan’s Trade Minister Yoji Muto will visit the US next week as Tokyo steps up efforts to seek a reprieve from President Donald Trump’s tariff campaign.】

item.title: 德国人放开消费，投资者拥抱 "勇敢的新欧洲
item.description: 在欧洲市场经历了一周的历史性转变之后，投资者宣称这可能仅仅是个开始。【原文：After a week of historic shifts in European markets, investors are declaring it may be just the beginning.】

item.title: 我们刚刚见证了欧洲几十年来最重要的一周
item.description:
大规模的财政刺激和支出。【原文：

Massive fiscal stimulus and spending.

】

item.title: 新的人工智能天气模型已在改变能源交易方式
item.description:
欧洲预测中心的系统将帮助电力和天然气交易商在受气候变化影响的市场中更快地采取行动。【原文：

The European forecasting center’s system is poised to help power and gas traders make quicker moves in markets convulsed by climate change.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：我们刚刚见证了欧洲几十年来最重要的一周（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：我们刚刚见证了欧洲几十年来最重要的一周（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: We Just Saw Europe’s Biggest Week in Decades (Podcast)】

item.title: 德国首富因适时下注而获利 90 亿美元
item.description: 德国首富克劳斯-迈克尔-库恩（Klaus-Michael Kühne）在其不断扩张的运输帝国实现盈利增长后，将获得至少 93 亿美元的红利。【原文：Klaus-Michael Kühne, Germany’s richest person, stands to reap at least $9.3 billion in dividends after a period of profitable growth at his expanding transport empire.】

item.title: 百度寻求发行 20 亿美元可兑换成 Trip.com 股票的债券
item.description: 中国科技公司百度公司（Baidu Inc.【原文：Chinese technology firm Baidu Inc. is offering as much as $2 billion in bonds that are exchangeable into Hong Kong shares of online-travel company Trip.com Group Ltd.】

item.title: 维斯塔斯支持的初创公司计划建造高耸的木制风力涡轮机塔
item.description: 瑞典 Modvion AB 公司将下一代风力涡轮机塔架的目标定得更高，因为该行业对更大结构的偏好没有放缓的迹象。【原文：Sweden’s Modvion AB has set its sights even higher for its next generation of wind-turbine towers as the industry’s preference for bigger structures shows no sign of slowing down.】

item.title: 欧佩克+放松产量限制，阿美石油公司下调亚洲油价
item.description: 随着欧佩克+组织开始放松对石油生产的限制，沙特阿拉伯正在降低面向其最大市场亚洲买家的石油价格。【原文：Saudi Arabia is cutting oil prices for buyers in Asia, its largest market, as OPEC+ begins to ease restrictions on production.】

item.title: 据说日本央行倾向于在 3 月会议上维持关键利率不变
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员在 1 月份加息后倾向于在本月维持利率不变，因为全球经济日益增长的不确定性需要密切关注。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are leaning toward keeping interest rates unchanged this month after their hike in January and as growing uncertainties in the global economy require close attention, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国施压要求尽快停战，欧洲天然气跌至五个月低点
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格继续大幅下跌，跌至 9 月下旬以来的最低水平，原因是美国要求在与乌克兰达成矿产协议的同时迅速实现停火。【原文：European natural gas prices extended their dramatic decline, tumbling to the lowest level since late September as the US presses for a quick ceasefire to accompany a minerals deal with Ukraine.】

item.title: 关税忧虑引发欧洲股市大面积回落
item.description: 欧洲股市周五回落，原因是迅速演变的关税背景和利率的不确定性促使投资者锁定利润。【原文：European equities retreated on Friday as the quickly-evolving tariff backdrop and uncertainty over interest rates prompted investors to lock in profits.】

item.title: 中国央行连续第四个月购买黄金，黄金价格创下历史新高
item.description: 随着贵金属涨至历史新高，中国央行在 2 月份连续第四个月扩大了黄金储备。【原文：China’s central bank expanded its gold reserves for a fourth month in February, as the precious metal rallied to record high.】

item.title: 德国债券趋于稳定，1990 年以来最糟糕的一周即将结束
item.description: 由于投资者暂停评估德国统一以来最糟糕的一周，德国债券周五趋于稳定。【原文：German bonds stabilized on Friday as investors paused to assess what’s set to be their worst week since the nation’s reunification.】

item.title: 菲律宾调查数百名被指控的中国间谍网络
item.description: 一位高级官员说，菲律宾当局发现了一个由数百名被指控的中国间谍组成的网络，这次行动比之前披露的要广泛得多，加剧了两国之间的紧张关系。【原文：Philippine authorities have uncovered a network of hundreds of alleged Chinese spies, a senior official said, a much more extensive operation than previously disclosed that adds to tensions between the countries.】

item.title: 加拿大与菲律宾在中国紧张局势下推进军事协定
item.description: 菲律宾和加拿大结束了一项重要军事协议的谈判，在马尼拉与北京就有争议的南海问题关系紧张之际，两国扩大了防务合作关系。【原文：The Philippines and Canada have concluded negotiations for a key military agreement, as Manila expands defense partnerships amid tensions with Beijing over the disputed South China Sea.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行在不确定性中保持开放态度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行不排除任何加息的可能性，并随时准备在地缘政治迅速变化的背景下采取行动。【原文：The European Central Bank isn’t ruling anything out on interest rates and stands ready to act amid a rapidly shifting geopolitical backdrop, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 默茨获胜前德国工厂订单创一年来最大降幅
item.description: 1 月份，德国工厂订单创下一年来最大降幅，这为欧洲最大经济体本季度的增长开了个坏头。【原文：German factory orders fell in January by the most in a year, a poor start to a quarter when Europe’s largest economy may have struggled to achieve any growth at all.】

item.title: 欧尔班计划调查匈牙利人以减缓乌克兰加入欧盟的步伐
item.description: 乌克兰总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）表示，他计划举行一次国内民意调查，作为有意放慢乌克兰加入欧盟步伐的举措之一。【原文：Prime Minister Viktor Orban said he plans to hold a domestic survey of public opinion as part of moves to deliberately slow Ukraine’s European Union accession.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦将关键利率上调至 16.5%，通胀率飙升
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦中央银行出人意料地提高了关键利率，以帮助抑制几乎是目标两倍的加速通胀。【原文：Kazakhstan’s central bank unexpectedly hiked its key interest rate to help tame accelerating inflation that’s running at almost double the target.】

item.title: 韩国撤销提高医学院学生入学率的计划
item.description: 韩国将取消增加医学院学生人数的计划，条件是因抗议而请假的在校学生必须在 3 月底前返回教室。【原文：South Korea will scrap plans to increase the number of medical school students on condition that current students who took leave under protest return to their classrooms by the end of March.】

item.title: 在争夺黄金的竞争中，澳大利亚向美国运送创纪录数量的黄金
item.description: 1 月份，澳大利亚运往美国的黄金数量创下历史新高，因为人们担心潜在的关税，交易商们急于将金属运入纽约仓库，以利用主要市场之间的极端价格波动。【原文：Australia shipped a record amount of gold to the US in January, as fears over potential tariffs saw traders rush to deliver metal into New York warehouses in order to capitalize on extreme price dislocations between key markets.】

item.title: 现场直播：富时 100 指数有望迎来今年最差一周
特朗普抨击印度 "非常高 "的关税，莫迪寻求缓兵之计
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次批评印度的高关税，表示印度仍是将于 4 月 2 日生效的对等关税的目标。【原文：US President Donald Trump repeated his criticism of India’s high tariffs, indicating the country remains a target of reciprocal duties set to take effect April 2.】

item.title: 子弹用金属激增近 300% 后面临更大短缺风险
item.description: 据一家公司称，随着美国和欧洲补充在乌克兰使用的子弹和炸弹的库存，全球锑短缺（锑广泛用于弹药）的情况可能会恶化。【原文：A global shortage of antimony — widely used in munitions — could worsen as the US and Europe replenish stockpiles of bullets and bombs used in Ukraine, according to the company building one of the niche metal’s few new sources of supplies.】

item.title: K-Pop明星NewJeans在关键审判开始时惊喜亮相
item.description: 周五，决定 K-pop 红人 NewJeans 命运的审判开始了，这个女子组合的意外亮相标志着一场史无前例的行业反抗。【原文：A trial to decide the fate of K-pop sensation NewJeans began Friday with the surprise appearance of the girl group whose decision to ditch their label marked an unprecedented industry revolt.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的信托基金申请印度最大的房地产投资信托基金 IPO
item.description: 印度知识房地产信托公司（Knowledge Realty Trust）已申请批准首次公开发行 620 亿卢比（约合 7.11 亿美元）的股票，这可能是印度最大的房地产投资信托上市项目。【原文：India’s Knowledge Realty Trust has sought approval for an initial public offering of 62 billion rupees ($711 million), in what could be the nation’s largest real estate investment trust listing.】
